RelatedSentence: Liberal Leader Kathleen Wynne will run along the waterfront at 10 a.m. , before making an announcement at Ontario Place .
Progressive Conservative Leader Tim Hudak will make a campaign stop at a cabinetry business in Mississauga .
NDP Leader Andrea Horwath will speak with voters north in the York West riding with candidate Tom Rakocevic before meeting with reporters at a neighbourhood bakery .
